comments.comments_text: Goal! Mauro Icardi (Inter) was in the right place at the right time to pounce on the rebound inside the box and gleefully rifles the ball home. It's 0:1.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Marcelo Brozovic (Inter) picks up the ball from a rebound and from the edge of the box he unleashes a low shot into the bottom left corner. Thomas Strakosha is unable to keep the ball out of the net. It's 0:2.
